page.title: 20Children's Problems in Fife
page.content: At maths I get all confused.Ithink big sums are hard,but they are easy.I get frustrated and when I think I have it it goes away and I have to start again but I can go out to the teacher which helps a little.{(Sharon Cowan aged 11) I want to play the guitar.I want to finish Manic Miner{(Fraser Wright 11) Being a girl.{(Angela Davidson 11) My Mum and Dad being separated{(anon) My biggest problem is knowing if Linda is stll going out with me.Its the way she is acting.She looks at me and when I look back she turns away as if in disgust.{(Stephen Cartwright 11)} My problem is I don't kow what to do if I get bored.I don't know what to do.{(Ewan Scott 11) I am not as good a footballer as Fraser Wright and I can't beat him at Subbuteo {(Allan Scott 11)
